document_data.title: Sharp Teeth, Mostly Tasty
document_data.realm year: The Year of New Peoples ([[1370 DR]]){{LJ}}
document_data.Summary: The adventure took place in the Year of New Peoples of the Malatran Calendar ([[1370 DR]]). After the [[Ootoongee Hairpin Festival]] of the [[Koshiva]] tribe, the chieftain's wife lost her vision. Chieftain [[Katar (Koshiva)|Katar]] sent a group of heroes of the [[Living Jungle]] to find a dangerous tribe – the cannibalistic [[Kukalatu]] of the [[Hebika River]]. After a trick through the jungles, the heroes met now reformed Kukalatu hunters who showed no ill will and had a streak of dark humor. The leader of the tribe was the [[Eldest One]] who offered the heroes a healing concoction, however, to prepare the medicine, she needed waters and unique blind [[cave fish]] of [[Nu-le Mi-se]] from within the [[Moaning Cave]]. The adventurers braved the dangerous caves and returned with a {{SI|200|lb|k|long=yes}} [[gourd]] filled with fish and cave water. The Eldest One prepared the promised medicine, cooked a feast of the blind cave fish for her tribe, and happily opened trade relations with previously hostile Malatran tribes.
